thread.title: BRIEF-China Unicom Hong Kong Says Dec Aggregate Number Of Mobile Billing Subscribers 284.2 Mln

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-China Unicom Hong Kong Says Dec Aggregate Number Of Mobile Billing Subscribers 284.2 Mln

organizations.name: unicom hong kong says dec aggregate number of mobile

text:
Jan 19 (Reuters) - China Unicom Hong Kong Ltd:
* DEC AGGREGATE NUMBER OF MOBILE BILLING SUBSCRIBERS 284.163 MILLION
* DEC NET ADDITION OF MOBILE BILLING SUBSCRIBERS FOR MONTH 2.824 MILLION
* DEC AGGREGATE NUMBER OF 4G SUBSCRIBERS 174.876 MILLION * DEC NET ADDITION OF 4G SUBSCRIBERS FOR MONTH 4.438 MILLION
* DEC AGGREGATE NUMBER OF FIXED-LINE BROADBAND SUBSCRIBERS 76.539 MILLION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
